version_description:
— 5X increased chance of tank drop in bunker's lobby boxes!
— Multiple performance enhancements.

We haven’t added anything new to the Alfa bunker for a while and now its time has come:
— Save an army specialist and get access to a new mode with special enemies.
— Earn a reputation among the army and you’ll be able to get rare items and even modify your weapon!
— Fight a new zombie type - The Blind One and get trophies for killing it.
— Welcome new weapons: SCAR, dual Berettas and Multi-Shot grenade launcher, they will make your trip to the bunker a bit more comfortable.
— Minor bugs fixed and game optimization improved.

Christmas is coming and we are happy to present an update dedicated to this holiday:
— Decorate a Christmas tree and collect ornaments and your gifts won’t make you wait.
— Added new event “Holiday Van”. Keep an eye on the global map, it will appear towards the holiday!
— Holiday weapons and armor! Magic and fireworks attached.
— Treats to any taste that also give bonuses to stats.
— Christmas without a turkey on the holiday table? No way!
— Enable a device that can restart the Alfa bunker.

Christmas is coming and we are happy to present an update dedicated to this holiday:
— Decorate a Christmas tree and collect ornaments and your gifts won’t make you wait.
— Added new event “Holiday Van”. Keep an eye on the global map, it will appear towards the holiday!
— Holiday weapons and armor! Magic and fireworks attached.
— Treats to any taste that also give bonuses to stats.
— Christmas without a turkey on the holiday table? No way!
— Enable a device that can restart the Alfa bunker.

We added a new event called Raids!
— Attack other survivors’ bases that raiders will point to!
— Crush everything on your way and take your loot!
— Build powerful defense for your base and revenge survivors that attacked you!
— C4 is available now! Look for it in the bunker and other dangerous locations.
It’s up to you to decide whether to raid other’s’ base or not. But as soon as you agree to raid, other survivors will be able to attack your base as well.
此更新解决了多个兼容性问题

— Removed holiday items except turkey and flare gun.
— Complete raiders’ tasks to attack neighbours’ bases more often.
— Now breaking 1 level walls makes less noise.
— After a deal with Raiders other survivors will be able to attack your base for 24 hours.
— Raiders can steal your stuff on others’ bases and bunkers.
— Changed radio. Look for useful contacts on the correct frequency.

We localized the game into Chinese simplified and Chinese traditional. Thus, we are happy to present you a special update!
— New event on the map. Complete new tasks and get special rewards.
— Want to prove to be the best in battles? Compete with a new character in destroying dangerous zombies.
— New weapon and armor. Feel like a true warrior!
— Try new dishes with bonuses to stats.

春节到了，我们很高兴邀请你与我们一起庆祝：
— 地图上的新活动。帮助一位睿智的老人准备好迎接新的一年。
— 寻找特殊物品并在交易商处换取带有奖励的菜肴。别忘了，你必须组装一部无线电，交易商才会出现！
— 没有爆竹和烟花怎么能叫过年？在特殊地点寻找它们，别忘了火把！

It’s Chinese New Year and we are excited to invite you to celebrate it with us:
— New event on the map. Help a wise elderly to get ready to see the new year in.
— Look for special items and exchange them for meals with bonuses at Dealer’s. Don’t forget that you have to assemble a radio for Dealer to appear!
— What kind of New Year is it without crackers and fireworks? Look for them on a special location and don’t forget a torch!

– There are dogs in the game now!
– Look for a new building in the list of blueprints - a dog crate where you can keep little puppies.
– Breed animals, look for the right match for them and grow new species.
– Many dogs have born traits: bloodhound will help your look for rare items, hunter - to track rare animals.
– And you’ll be able to take some dogs with you, you will need them when passing hard-to-reach places and encountering enemies.

It’s Chinese New Year and we are excited to invite you to celebrate it with us:
— New event on the map. Help a wise elderly to get ready to see the new year in.
— Look for special items and exchange them for meals with bonuses at Dealer’s. Don’t forget that you have to assemble a radio for Dealer to appear!
— What kind of New Year is it without crackers and fireworks? Look for them on a special location and don’t forget a torch!

Potential bug from previous version fixed

— Now you can change your appearance. Hair length or skin color - no problem! And you can finally play as a female character!
— Sometimes Dealer will contact you via radio and ask for certain things to make a deal.
— Increased chances of “clean” boxes drop on the locations indicated on the floppy with coordinates.
— It seems that the generator in the bunker is charged enough to get the elevator down to the 4th floor.
— Raiders have new quests which means even more ways to gain their goodwill.
— Turret recipe changed. Now it can be used for protecting your house.
— In order to make your way to chests during raids easier we added an opportunity to break furniture with a hatchet.
— There’s a temporary oak location in the game with interesting events.
— We have added the Korean language.

– Various minor bug fixes.
– Multiple performance enhancements.

– There are dogs in the game now!
– Look for a new building in the list of blueprints - a dog crate where you can keep little puppies.
– Breed animals, look for the right match for them and grow new species.
– Many dogs have born traits: bloodhound will help your look for rare items, hunter - to track rare animals.
– And you’ll be able to take some dogs with you, you will need them when passing hard-to-reach places and encountering enemies.

– Access to Wall Sector 7 open! There you will find everything you need for studying the infected zone.
– Cluster of anomalies spotted on the global map. One can visit this location only with a protective costume.
– Be ready to encounter other survivors in the new infected zone. Power armor radio module will let you exchange messages with random players that appear to be nearby.
Cluster of anomalies is just the beginning of the process of establishing direct contact between survivors.

– 一个发光的武器架会让你的避难所看起来更加炫酷。现在你可以展示你的战利品，深情地欣赏它们。
– 你现在可以随时重命名你的宠物。
– 新的角色表情可以让你控制宠物的行动，如果它拥有“真正的朋友”技能的话。
– 现在僵尸在激战中对彼此的伤害有所减少。
– 添加了工作台通知。你可以在游戏设置中管理通知。

– New ability system! Standard actions in locations earn you exploration experience and points for various skills.
– The location entry screen has been updated.
– A Recycler is now available. Give new life to all the junk in your chests!
– Certain recipes have been changed.
– The Gunsmith Bench is temporarily unavailable. Its functions are now fulfilled by the new Recycler.
– The chance of a fuel tank dropping in the bunker has been increased.

– New threat in the infected zone of Sector 7! You can now encounter Zombie Cocoons, which must be destroyed.
– It won’t be easy to break them. Team up with other players to make it faster and more fun!
– New tool for the power armor – an engineering multitool capable of replacing your weapon.
– It’s now easier to build a dog crate.

– New threat in the infected zone of Sector 7! You can now encounter Zombie Cocoons, which must be destroyed.
– It won’t be easy to break them. Team up with other players to make it faster and more fun!
– New tool for the power armor – an engineering multitool capable of replacing your weapon.
– It’s now easier to build a dog crate.

– It’s Last Day on Earth’s anniversary! Also, a new event is taking place on the map!
– A new terrifying creature known as the Witch has appeared in the infected forest. Slay her to prevent the next assault of the Horde.
– There’s a chance that upon defeating the Witch you might get trophy that can be activated.
– New recipes for the recycler have been added.
– The amount of food that dogs require has been reduced.

– New enemies in Sector 7 - Ashy zombies. Team up with others to survive.
– Power armor can receive damage from enemies. New power armor module - gas burner, used for removing damages from the costume.
– Matching system in raids updated.

– Japanese language added.
– “Exploration experience” removed from the list of perks. Now experience points are spent only for skills.
– Increased chance to get the skill “Motorcycle Driver”.
– Increased chance to run into a puppy on a location with an aid box.
– Bug of displaying looted items fixed
– Revenge bug with missing raider’s footsteps fixed

– Added weapon customization - go craft your unique gun!
– Changed Gunsmith Bench functionality - now you can modify all kinds of weapons there.
– Blueprints for modifications! Look for them in the bunker, airdrop, red locations and get them for disassembling firearms.
– New resources: adhesive, springs, big bones, carbon composite and factory parts. You’ll need them not only for modifications.
– New rewards for reputation at Specialist’s.
– Sector 7 entry price decreased.

– Friends list added - it’s up to you to decide who is your friend and who is your foe.
– In-game chat added so that you can communicate with your Friends from any location.
– Radio tower recipe changed - one will need it to connect to players.
– Some interface elements changed.

– Friends list added - it’s up to you to decide who is your friend and who is your foe.
– In-game chat added so that you can communicate with your Friends from any location.
– Radio tower recipe changed - one will need it to connect to players.
– Some interface elements changed.

— New location - Crooked Creek Farm!
— Farmer zombies, infected bulls and new boss Ravager added.
— New rewards added.
— Chance of gas tank drop in the bunker increased, now you can get it on the Farm as well.

— New temporary event “Destroyed convoy”
— Less misses in battle - all modifications increasing automatic weapon stability are more effective now
— It’s easier to get wanted skills - we sped up their upgrade in most locations
— Crafting and assembling Gunsmith Bench simplified
— Recipe of disassembling generator added
Various minor bug fixes

— New event “Police Station” in the game.
— Ready to meet new enemies? Mutated police officers and prisoners, guys from a special department and armored zombie with a shield are already waiting for brave adventurers.
— Who dares wins the jackpot! The difficulty of the event depends on the reward you wish to get.

— Time to make up a loud name for your gang and make it famous in the zombie wasteland – clans added to the game!
— Winter is coming, therefore we increased the chances of getting the skill “Cold Survival” when farming oak locations.
— Decorations updated - you can sometimes find new boxes to loot. And from time to time run into rare zombies.
— Survival Guide added - a set of quests that will help you get missing chopper parts and learn more on the universe of Last Day on Earth.

— You asked for it - we did it. Convoy is back in the game! The event got updated and new development scenarios were added.
— The convoy comes with the rumors about some secret room in the bunker lobby.
— Modifications for the legendary Winchester added.

— Young and green survivors, you can take your breath in “Motel” .
— The entertainment includes: new location, nice loot, new and not difficult game mechanics.
— Friendly tip - stock up on axes, if a hungry zombie smells survivor blood, even walls won't stop him.

– 第 4 赛季开始了！
– 新的圣诞地点：尼克·桑蒂的房子
– 装饰圣诞树比赛
– 圣诞树装饰品回收和精炼
– 尼克·桑蒂的房子中的照相机
– 3 个赛季活动地点
– 节日僵尸
– 摩托车的新皮肤
– 以我们的限时优惠来庆祝节日

– Season 3 is on.
– Bunker Bravo is available for play.
– ATV is available for assembling.
– 2 new swamp locations.
– New event Defense of fort Moss.
– New event Junkyard.
– Fishing is added.
– Auto location clear out is available.
– A slot machine with prizes is added to Gas Station.
– Racks at the home base are improved.
– New resources.
– New workbenches.
– New recipes.

— 第 7 区有了新的军团地点——哨站。
— 该地点可以放置工作台和箱子。
— 请注意：每三天，该地点就会被放射风暴完全摧毁。
— 存活者可以在墙后收集资源。
— 第 7 区新增了斧头、镐、近战武器、背包和额外口袋。
— 游戏平衡得到了改善。
— 武器和护甲的配方根据平衡改进做出了更改。

– 放射风暴每七天发生一次。
– 第 7 区增加了饥饿和口渴。
– 第 7 区添加了新药品。但要小心：过多的抗生素会导致药物过量。
– 现在玩家可以在哨站上自行放置工作台。
– 添加了篝火和雨水收集器。
– 军团中有新级别：心腹
– 资源位置现在会随机生成。

– 第 7 区中的新全球地图，可显示盟友。
– 哨站不是被放射风暴，而是被僵尸群击中的。
– 新的辐射和抗辐射药品机制。
– 增加了第 7 区的护甲和武器的耐久度。
– 哨站的军团仓库。
– 新的排名和抢占地点。
– 新枪 HK416 和万圣节礼物。
– 派系成员将获得掉落率的奖励。

— 现在可以在资源地点找到进入地下室的入口。你可以一夜暴富了。
— 仔细探索每一座地下室，一共有好几座，每座地下室的战利品都各不相同。
— 准备迎接新的敌人。
— 对于那些想在晚上大干一场，击败矿工的玩家，我们减少了修复第 7 区终端所需的物品数量。

— 第 7 区增加了新的武器和盾牌。一些武器具有稀有技能。
— 增加了新的战斗装备。
— 墙壁后面的配方清单中有新的武器和铠甲可以制作。你可以组装任何东西，从矛到猎枪。
— 增加了新的制作资源。
— 第 7 区的地点进行了视觉改变。
— 新的任务。
— 增加了墙壁后面的感染者箱子。
— 新敌人：守卫、腐烂僵尸和矿工头目。

— Let’s unite. Make a party of up to 3 members and set off to Sector 7 with your friends instead of random players.
— Clan storage added.
— Devourer mechanics changed.
— Twitch Drops for streamers and their viewers added.

— 《地球末日》的 2 岁生日庆祝活动已开始！
— 庆祝活动将在一个新的地方举行。
— 玩家将获得周年庆特别推出的游戏内物品。
— 游戏中添加了哈士奇。
— 你可以在过冬的地方和有人道主义援助箱的地方找到它们。
— 哈士奇只和彼此交配。

— Character upgrading system and level up system completely updated.
— Every new level awarded with 1 skill.
— Number of levels increased to 200.
— Old skills partially replaced with new ones.

— Thorough cleaning time. Don’t panic, we did everything ourselves. Decreased the number of small chests, increased the number of slots in big ones and carefully put all items in their places.
— Didn’t know what you need skill “Burglar” for? Now you’ll learn.
— Raiders came to their senses and redefined their requests. Added new tasks, lowered the price for skipping them.
— Gasoline consumption when traveling within locations halved.
— Added grenade.
— The event Carnival will be held from 21.02 to 08.03

— Stock up on sweets, pumpkins and scary dresses - you never know who might come trick or treat you this Halloween when it’s Last Day on Earth.
— One event is good but two is better - we also celebrate Día de los Muertos this year! You are about to meet Catrina and help her support the undead spiritual journey.
— Rumors has the Father Jaud cult signs have been spotted again.
— Both events are favored with new enemies, skins, locations and rewards.

— Stock up on sweets, pumpkins and scary dresses - you never know who might come trick or treat you this Halloween when it’s Last Day on Earth.
— One event is good but two is better - we also celebrate Día de los Muertos this year! You are about to meet Catrina and help her support the undead spiritual journey.
— Rumors has the Father Jaud cult signs have been spotted again.
— Both events are favored with new enemies, skins, locations and rewards.

— Stock up on sweets, pumpkins and scary dresses - you never know who might come trick or treat you this Halloween when it’s Last Day on Earth.
— One event is good but two is better - we also celebrate Día de los Muertos this year! You are about to meet Catrina and help her support the undead spiritual journey.
— Rumors has the Father Jaud cult signs have been spotted again.
— Both events are favored with new enemies, skins, locations and rewards.

— Now every clan will get its own base under Sector 7.
— All players that have unlocked Sector 7 and joined a Clan have access to it.
— Chances of Chopper parts drop increased in boxes for yellow and red coupons of bunker Alfa and on the Farm.
— Engine parts drop highly increased on the Farm, in boxes for bunker Alfa coupons of all colors and for a floppy.

— 新地点“加油站”
— 建造一个车库，像一个真正的车手一样度过你的夜晚，升级你的铁骑。
— 骑上你的摩托车，撞击每一个生物或碾过每一个僵尸。
— 提供 3 种新型摩托车：越野摩托车、军用摩托车和警用摩托车。

— New event! It is accessible for survivors of level 7 and higher. We prepared everything you’ll need - we crafted snowmobiles, brought snow, built the track.
— Everyone loves gifts! Santa zombie have run through all locations and scattered magic boxes for all those who have been nice this year.
— You can set up a Christmas Tree and get gifts every day.
— New zombie types. For killing some of them you’ll get ornaments that can be changed for Christmas food, clothes and flare guns.

— Hunters’ camp is calling for help in saving one of the hunters, the event is available for survivors at level 10 and higher;
— Small but swift - you can smash zombies with Mini Uzi now;
— Visit the Snowy race track event, Ralph wants to please you with a Christmas gift;
— Give me a sledgehammer! Now when you destroy walls yourself in build mode, you will get a part of the resources back;
— Motorcycle skins redesigned. Now enemies will give envious looks to your painted bike

- Martial law in Sector 7. The zone is filled with Ashy zombies;
- In fights your power armor got damaged, you'll need a Hazmat suit;
- You can enter the zone without the suit, but then you will die a painful death from radiation;
- On the location Infected Wasteland you can find first-aid kits, old revolvers, and parts of Hazmat suit

— Holiday festivities go on - new bosses are waiting for first victims;
— Claus, Greg, and Kramp are going to spoil your mood;
— The enemies are serious. Rookies would better not mess up with them, the bosses are available for players at level 15 and higher.

— Time to spot the most skillful survivor of our post-apocalyptic wasteland. Slow enemies down, deal critical blows and more damage - weapon mods with active skills are added to the game!
— Now you can try various modification assemblies, save the best presets and apply them with a single button. This will save you a bunch of time.

— Character upgrading system and level up system completely updated.
— Every new level awarded with 1 skill.
— Number of levels increased to 200.
— Old skills partially replaced with new ones.

— Thorough cleaning time. Don’t panic, we did everything ourselves. Decreased the number of small chests, increased the number of slots in big ones and carefully put all items in their places.
— Didn’t know what you need skill “Burglar” for? Now you’ll learn.
— Raiders came to their senses and redefined their requests. Added new tasks, lowered the price for skipping them.
— Gasoline consumption when traveling within locations halved.
— Added grenade.
— The event Carnival will be held from 21.02 to 08.03

– Breaking news spread across the apocalyptic wasteland — Sector 7 saw significant changes.
– 4 new infected zones available for adventures.
– A new set of armor and new weapons for fighting in infected zones added.
– An unknown warrior will be waiting for every brave survivor ready to pass the Wall. He will offer you to complete a set of quests.

— More weapon active skills!
— Wardrobe recipe for the most classy survivors.
— Raise a pint to St. Patrick’s Day. No global festivities shaping up, but you’ll have a chance to get a hat. Permanently!
— For all lonely survivors craving for a company, we’ve added a mannequin.
— Global map has been changed. Pay attention to where you’re going.
— Hello, Thailand! The game has been localized specially for you.

— More weapon active skills!
— Wardrobe recipe for the most classy survivors.
— Raise a pint to St. Patrick’s Day. No global festivities shaping up, but you’ll have a chance to get a hat. Permanently!
— For all lonely survivors craving for a company, we’ve added a mannequin.
— Global map has been changed. Pay attention to where you’re going.
— Hello, Thailand! The game has been localized specially for you.

— Let’s unite. Make a party of up to 3 members and set off to Sector 7 with your friends instead of random players.
— Devourer mechanics changed.
— Twitch Drops for streamers and their viewers added.

— Let’s unite. Make a party of up to 3 members and set off to Sector 7 with your friends instead of random players.
— Clan storage added.
— Devourer mechanics changed.
— Twitch Drops for streamers and their viewers added.

— New event “Mercenaries’ Camp”. Available to survivors at level 10 and higher.
— You can make a contract with one of the available mercenaries for a certain time period and take them to mop up locations from zombies with you.
— Every mercenary is unique and has their strengths and weaknesses. Choose wisely!

– 新活动“雇佣兵营”。10 级及以上的存活者可以参加。
– 你可以在一段时间内与一个可用的雇佣兵签订合同，带着他们一起扫荡地点中的僵尸。
– 每个雇佣兵都是独一无二的，各有优点和缺点。请做出明智的选择！

— 《地球末日》的 2 岁生日庆祝活动已开始！
— 庆祝活动将在一个新的地方举行。
— 玩家将获得周年庆特别推出的游戏内物品。
— 游戏中添加了哈士奇。
— 你可以在过冬的地方和有人道主义援助箱的地方找到它们。
— 哈士奇只和彼此交配。

— 第 7 区增加了新的武器和盾牌。一些武器具有稀有技能。
— 增加了新的战斗装备。
— 墙壁后面的配方清单中有新的武器和铠甲可以制作。你可以组装任何东西，从矛到猎枪。
— 增加了新的制作资源。
— 第 7 区的地点进行了视觉改变。
— 新的任务。
— 增加了墙壁后面的感染者箱子。
— 新敌人：守卫、腐烂僵尸和矿工头目。

— 现在可以在资源地点找到进入地下室的入口。你可以一夜暴富了。
— 仔细探索每一座地下室，一共有好几座，每座地下室的战利品都各不相同。
— 准备迎接新的敌人。
— 对于那些想在晚上大干一场，击败矿工的玩家，我们减少了修复第 7 区终端所需的物品数量。

— 第 7 区有了新的军团地点——哨站。
— 该地点可以放置工作台和箱子。
— 请注意：每三天，该地点就会被放射风暴完全摧毁。
— 存活者可以在墙后收集资源。
— 第 7 区新增了斧头、镐、近战武器、背包和额外口袋。
— 游戏平衡得到了改善。
— 武器和护甲的配方根据平衡改进做出了更改。

– Season 1 begins right now!
– With the beginning of the season you’ve received access to weekly quests and unique rewards: new skins for Chopper, Corgis, and other valuable items.
– We’ve changed the bike upgrade system and added some new models.
– Crashed ship brought new zombies.
– New storyline - find out the secret of Darren Wells.

– 放射风暴每七天发生一次。
– 第 7 区增加了饥饿和口渴。
– 第 7 区添加了新药品。但要小心：过多的抗生素会导致药物过量。
– 现在玩家可以在哨站上自行放置工作台。
– 添加了篝火和雨水收集器。
– 军团中有新级别：心腹
– 资源位置现在会随机生成。

– 放射风暴每七天发生一次。
– 第 7 区增加了饥饿和口渴。
– 第 7 区添加了新药品。但要小心：过多的抗生素会导致药物过量。
– 现在玩家可以在哨站上自行放置工作台。
– 添加了篝火和雨水收集器。
– 军团中有新级别：心腹
– 资源位置现在会随机生成。

– 第 2 季开始。
– 巴克上校的剧情。了解军事实验的故事。
– 活动“存活者营地”。拯救存活者免受僵尸攻击。
– 活动“感染区”。消灭所有的茧和污染僵尸。
– 击败新的僵尸和头目。
– 新增鱼叉。
– 游戏中加入了期待已久的凯芙拉护甲。

– 第 2 季开始。
– 巴克上校的剧情。了解军事实验的故事。
– 活动“存活者营地”。拯救存活者免受僵尸攻击。
– 活动“感染区”。消灭所有的茧和污染僵尸。
– 击败新的僵尸和头目。
– 新增鱼叉。
– 游戏中加入了期待已久的凯芙拉护甲。

– 第 7 区中的新全球地图，可显示盟友。
– 哨站不是被放射风暴，而是被僵尸群击中的。
– 新的辐射和抗辐射药品机制。
– 增加了第 7 区的护甲和武器的耐久度。
– 哨站的军团仓库。
– 新的排名和抢占地点。
– 新枪 HK416 和万圣节礼物。
– 派系成员将获得掉落率的奖励。

– Season 3 is on.
– Bunker Bravo is available for play.
– ATV is available for assembling.
– 2 new swamp locations.
– New event Defense of fort Moss.
– New event Junkyard.
– Fishing is added.
– Auto location clear out is available.
– A slot machine with prizes is added to Gas Station.
– Racks at the home base are improved.
– New resources.
– New workbenches.
– New recipes.

– 第 4 赛季开始了！
– 新的圣诞地点：尼克·桑蒂的房子
– 装饰圣诞树比赛
– 圣诞树装饰品回收和精炼
– 尼克·桑蒂的房子中的照相机
– 3 个赛季活动地点
– 节日僵尸
– 摩托车的新皮肤
– 以我们的限时优惠来庆祝节日

– 冬季盛宴还在进行！第 5 赛季正在开始！
– 准备好遇到新头目 - 讨厌比利、狂野杰西和好运露西。
– 想感受迫击炮的破坏力吗？来看看新活动“炮击”吧。
– 最有冒险精神的存活者可以去猎熊
– 新增临时地点 – 矿井
– 现在你可以定制内衣和背包
– 找到海报并获得有价值的奖励

– 发现弹坑城市！
– 分配中心、贫民窟和一个新的军团基地。一切都取决于你的行动。
– 从单人游戏模式切换到多人游戏模式的新系统。
– 抢占地点系统已移除。
– 新活动“十字路口”。做好准备吧。

– 第 6 赛季开始了！
– 发现了存活者定居点
– 提升你在营地居民中的声望并获取奖励
– 新的任务和活动地点
– 新的鱼：鳟鱼和 2 道鱼类菜肴
– 新的摩托车、背包和内衣皮肤

– 第 7 赛季已经开始了！
– 新的活动地点：监狱
– 车手在附近建立了一个营地，并为你提供参加大胆抢夺的机会
– 潜行还是爆破突击，由你来决定
– 根据所选择的风格，执行多种任务以进行抢夺的准备
– 角色的治疗进行了改动
– 新的武器和护甲
– 摩托和背包的新皮肤

– 我们正在一同庆祝3周年生存纪念日！
– 疯狂市集是节日聚会的中心
– 市集活动包括火鸡赛跑、格斗俱乐部、算命等等
– 挑战自己！参加比赛，赢得精彩奖品
– 赛季通行证中设有声望系统
– 新款炫酷摩托和背包

– 第 9 赛季在墙壁后开始了！
– 弹坑城市正在引入贸易和新的货币
– 带有个人工作台的工坊现已开放
– 存活者之间的比赛将在弹坑举行
– 现在，你可以在弹坑乘坐地铁造访其他存活者
– 发现多人地点：铝土矿采掘场和红色森林
– 新的资源、物品、工作台和武器
– 新的统计数值“人气”
– 增加了潜行移动和攻击的能力
– 进入弹坑所需的等级将降低到 15 级

– 僵尸狩猎赛季已经开始！
– 野外营地和僵尸猎人的合同
– 捕捉和研究僵尸
– 第 10 赛季地点的天气情况
– 活动地点：被毁的实验室和科学家的货车
– 全新摩托、内衣和背包
– 更新了赛季通行证系统。

– 第 11 赛季在弹坑开始！
– 现在墙壁后面也有摩托车了
– 弹坑的新型任务：合同
– 多人游戏的比赛新形式
– 商店的皮肤
– 新的背包和摩托车

– 第 11 赛季在弹坑开始！
– 现在墙壁后面也有摩托车了
– 弹坑的新型任务：合同
– 多人游戏的比赛新形式
– 商店的皮肤
– 新的背包和摩托车

– 僵尸之地的邮递！一群送货员在起源基地安营扎寨了
– 新机制：递送货物
– “节日场地”和万圣节活动“恐怖农场”
– 剧情任务及寻找失踪的起源员工
– 新的时尚背包和摩托
– 恢复了食物的即时治疗效果

– Breaking news! New permanent location Port is waiting for adventurers!
– New personal transport available for assembling - motorboat.
– New island locations rich in rare resources found in the bay.
– Titanium and other new resources in the game. Now you can craft several kinds of firearms.
– Deliveries returned to stay.
– Let’s party in zombie apocalypse style! The Christmas season is officially on.

– Breaking news! New permanent location Port is waiting for adventurers!
– New personal transport available for assembling - motorboat.
– New island locations rich in rare resources found in the bay.
– Titanium and other new resources in the game. Now you can craft several kinds of firearms.
– Deliveries returned to stay.
– Let’s party in zombie apocalypse style! The Christmas season is officially on.

– The holidays go on! The event dedicated to Chinese New Year returns.
– Show the legendary warrior maiden Mu Lan what a single survivor is worth.
– Protect the weak and save the holiday held in Silent Abode from canceling.
– Walk through Firework field.
– Try on armor and weapons that would make you worthy of showing up at the emperor’s reception.

– PvP locations. No rules. Objective – Survive and collect the reward!
– New business available. Become a lessor and rent out storages to other survivors.
– Every resident of the Crater can now get their own apartment!
– Furniture store opened up in Crater. Decorate your new home as you see fit.

– The risk of infestation is threatening the familiar locations. Join a new unique event and develop an antidote to eliminate the new threat.
– New quests and in-game events will help you get closer to the mystery of the Laboratory.
– Get ready to meet dangerous spore opponents in the infected locations.
– The development of the antidote will require the efforts of all survivors. Each contribution will be decently rewarded!

– The antidote development is complete and the gates to the Laboratory are open again!
– Replenish the energy reserve of the bioreactor to gain access to the bowels of the abandoned research complex.
– The experience of completing each sector of the Laboratory will be unique due to a special perk system.
– Fight new bosses and monsters that have become even more dangerous because of the infestation.
– For clearing out the Laboratory, you can get rewards such as new guns, medical supplies, and resources.

– Fight new bosses and monsters that have become even more dangerous because of the infestation.
– For clearing out the Laboratory, you can get rewards such as new guns, medical supplies, and resources.

– We’re having guests - bikers event starts in the Wastelands
– New event locations - Raiders’ Camp and Roadside Junkyard
– Complete bikers’ tasks and earn valuable rewards

— Become a real detective. The season of investigations is on!
— A new sheriff in the Wastelands - Russell has come to bring order.
— The “Last Stop” bar will become the main place of battling lawlessness: solve crimes, complete quests, and earn rewards.
— Prepare for a party! The celebration of the 4th anniversary of the game will take place at the bar.
— Customization of a survivor’s outfit is added to the game.
— Collector’s crate with bikes and backpacks from the previous seasons.

– Technical improvements and bug fixes.
– Auto filling of blueprints added.

– Two new sectors of the laboratory can now be explored!
– New perks and hard mode will make the exploration of the laboratory even more diverse.
– Gain reputation to open access to unique rewards.
– Battle armored zombies in hard mode.
– Clear blockages on the first floor of the laboratory and grow seaweed in the covered dock to fuel the bioreactor.
